name: Bow Shoot Rescue Game
description:
Bow Shoot Rescue Game!! Rescue the hostages with your bow and arrow - but be careful - it's an archery game with a twist, and a small mistake can cost your poor friends bad!

How to play:
Touch the screen, pull the finger in the hands, in order to pull the bowstring, aim the rope. Your goal is to save all the pending ones. Arrow and the amount of time is limited, do not hesitate and accurate shooting!
